post:
Hello all, I have an idle VPS from RocketVPS with a 50% off coupon grabbed at their launching party available for transfer. RocketVPS is the unmanaged brand of the reputable Knownhost, so you won't go wrong with them. 

The VPS is rock solid and well performing for the months I used it, and the support is very quick and professional. 

The 50% off coupon also applies to plan upgrades and cPanel, so you can get any plan at 50% off and cPanel for just $4.25.
The invoice for November is paid. PM me with your offer if you are interested.

One thing that I forgot to mention, it's their $9.99 256mb plan right now.

Fan
